body.name: Stranger Session: a dark romance novella
body.description: Stranger Session is a LIGHT/MEDIUM gray dark romance novella.DelIn the heat of a blind-date photo shoot, my obsession for her ignites. After we part ways, her image carves a path through my thoughts, leading me to dark places.Disguised by a mask, I cater to her every desire as I play the part of a stranger, but the secrets I harbor threaten to shatter the illicit passion we've found.Then she catches the eye of someone else, casting a sinister veil over our connection. I morph into her protector, even though it means she might end up hating me in the end.Are we destined to remain strangers, or can we turn into something picture-perfect?This dark romance novella is recommended for adult readers only. Please refer to LaurenBiel.com for content warnings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lighter but still fabulous
reviews.reviewText: From light snowman smut to pitch black mayo ruining filth, Lauren Biel can do it all. Stranger Session is another fantastic example of that. Del and Mariah have both given up on love and sign up for a photo shoot with a stranger having nothing to lose. The last thing they expected to gain was an attraction to each other.If you've never read a Lauren Biel novella before, buckle up. Del is possessive obsessive and finds his inner stalker when sparks fly with Mariah. Oh, and did I mention the 🍆 piercing? Just don't let him near your personal care products, I'll never buy an unsealed lotion bottle, iykyk. Mariah finds herself wanting to have her fantasies fulfilled after Del kickstarted her dormant desires.This would be the perfect novella to start your Lauren Biel journey with. Check your TWs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This started off as a contemporary romance and then mid book took a turn to a darker romance. I wasn't mad at it, it just threw me off for a moment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short and spicy
reviews.reviewText: Review time:⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️🌶️🌶️🌶️🌶️Thank you for letting me read this early! First Del is 🤤, a stalker with tattoos and a 🍆 piercing. Yes please.Once I started I could not put this down. Mariah has not one but two stalkers?! I loved the whole stranger photography session as those always looked interesting to me. I loved how Lauren was able to use it in her book and then turn it around to be a possessive stalker romance.Del gives Mariah all her fantasies and I am here for it. You will definitely want to read this quick spicy book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A "lighter" read from Lauren
reviews.reviewText: This novella is a good intro to CNC/stalker dark romance and is much lighter than your normal LB story, but its oh so good.A quick read but its not missing depth like a lot of novellas do.I enjoyed the premise of the story and the execution. To not only have one stalker, but two. Who's going to outsmart who?And in typical LB fashion we have something that we may never look at again the same. Mayo, IYKYK.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a fun lil read! Del and Mariah are absolutely perfect for eachother! The book was pretty good! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I Wish It Wasn’t A Novella
reviews.reviewText: Plot:⭐️⭐️⭐️.5 Spice:🌶️🌶️🌶️.5I would’ve loved it if it was a full length novel because I feel like so many things were rushed. I wish we got more of Del being a walking, stalking red flag. I wish there was mor groveling after he go caught. I wish the climax was more drawn out and I wish there was more craziness. Also the lotion that’s all I can say is THE LOTION!! Still a decent Novella though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who isn’t intrigued with a stranger session….
reviews.reviewText: I loved this book. It had the perfect balance between suspense and spice. It kept me wanting more and played with all those fantasies of masked men and being hunted. I always love picking up a book by Lauren because I know I’m in for a satisfying ride! Thank you so much for another escape from reality and a little bit of fun! I did receive this advanced copy for free and I’m leaving my review voluntarily! I hope you enjoy your read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stranger Session is everything you want & have come to expect from a Lauren masterpiece!!This book isn't as dark or traumatic as some, but it has plenty going on and a ton of spice!Del, the MC, is a delicious shade of greyMariah is his perfect counterpart!If you've never read anything by Lauren before, this book is an excellent first read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: MUST READ IF YOU ARE SPICY BOOK FAN
reviews.reviewText: I love Lauren's writing and how even in dark romance novels it does have it witty moments but this book was an absolute beauty and a rollercoaster read which I love! I hope Lauren does more books like this also waiting to see what is coming next from Lauren!
